Certificates.description: This course explored the meaning of mobile technology and its growth and benefits. It provided an introduction to mobile design concepts and development approaches, and outlined the seven principles underpinning the design of an effective mobile application. The concept of the Internet of Things (IOT) was also explained, including the associated benefits and challenges.
